import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../products' import axios from 'axios'; import Rating from '../components/Rating' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const [product,setproduct]=useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchproduct=async()=>{ const res=await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setproduct(res.data); } fetchproduct(); }, []) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Description : {product.description} Price : Rs {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ?"In Stock":"Out Of Stock"} ) } export default ProductScreen
